metadata.title: Derelict Space Station
metadata.description: The station appears abandoned. Life support is offline, but the structure seems intact.

scenario.title: Derelict Space Station
scenario.description: You detect faint power signatures from the core. The hull is intact but scarred by age.
scenario.systemMessage: [SCAN COMPLETE] Orbital structure identified: Research Station Alpha-7. Status: DERELICT. Age: ~15 years. Radiation: Nominal.

branches.label: Leave the station and continue exploration

outcomes.narrative: You mark the station's coordinates for future reference and continue on your way.

challenge.description: Navigating a derelict station requires both sharp observation and technical know-how.

narrative.title: Empty Station
narrative.description: After hours of searching, you find nothing of value. The station was stripped clean long ago.
narrative.systemMessage: [INVESTIGATION COMPLETE] No salvageable materials detected. Station database corrupted beyond recovery.

narrative.title: Supply Cache Discovered
narrative.description: You locate an emergency supply cache in the crew quarters. The contents are still sealed and functional.
narrative.systemMessage: [CACHE LOCATED] Emergency locker E-47 opened. Contents: Medical supplies, rations, spare parts.

narrative.title: Ambush!
narrative.description: The station wasn't as abandoned as you thought. Raiders emerge from the shadows, demanding your cargo!
narrative.systemMessage: [HOSTILE CONTACT] Multiple armed hostiles detected! WARNING: Combat situation imminent!

narrative.title: Unexpected Ally
narrative.description: You encounter a lone scientist who's been surviving on the station. They share valuable research data in exchange for passage.
narrative.systemMessage: [CONTACT ESTABLISHED] Dr. Elena Vasquez, Xenobiology Research Lead. Offering data exchange for rescue.

metadata.title: Active Research Station
metadata.description: The station's lights are on and life support is running. You receive a standard automated greeting.

scenario.title: Active Research Station
scenario.description: Life support is running and you detect crew signatures. The station broadcasts a standard greeting protocol.
scenario.systemMessage: [HAIL RECEIVED] Welcome to Research Station Gamma-3. Please state your business.

branches.label: Dock and trade with the station

outcomes.narrative: The station commander mentions they need help retrieving a lost probe. They'll pay well for its recovery.
The station has no current requests, but they thank you for asking.

metadata.title: Ancient Alien Structure
metadata.description: The structure doesn't match any known human architecture. Its purpose is unclear, but it radiates strange energy signatures.

scenario.title: Ancient Alien Structure
scenario.description: Unknown architecture with strange energy. Your sensors struggle to make sense of the readings.
scenario.systemMessage: [WARNING] Unknown structure detected. Energy signature: NON-STANDARD. Recommend caution.

branches.label: Perform detailed scan from safe distance

outcomes.narrative: Your sensors collect valuable data about the structure. This information could be worth a fortune to researchers.

branches.label: Approach the structure for closer examination

challenge.description: Understanding alien technology requires deep scientific knowledge and strong instincts.

outcomes.narrative: You decipher part of the structure's function and recover an intact artifact!
The structure's defenses activate! Your ship takes heavy damage before you can retreat!
